jobs.description: Permanent Role   Strong command of English   Has 1 -2 years of experience in sales  Job Responsibilities:    Prospecting and research activities in support of designated team.   Researches and reports on general market trends and activity within current and target client accounts   Assists team members in building and maintaining a strong sales pipeline.   Assists team in creating and maintaining forecasting data on a weekly, monthly and quarterly basis.   Supports other members of the team in achieving performance goals associated with quota achievement and sales activity.   Assists team members in meeting client requests, demonstrations, preparation for client meetings, literature requests and general customer facing support. Accompany Account Executives on client meetings   Compile and distribute client proposals   Coordinate with Legal regarding contract proposals, extensions, and amendments creation and processing   Coordinate resolution of credits and billing issues with Finance   May assist in Marketing and local events   Learns relevant product and technical knowledge   Develops a good understanding of SalesForce.com, to become proficient in CRM use.   Undertakes general support and administrative duties as required.  Job Requirements    Bachelors’ degree or equivalent experience required.   Demonstrates personal confidence and resilience.   Passion in desire to build a career in sales.   Familiar with prospecting and research techniques.   Experience in conducting prospecting (cold calls) and research calls.   Good levels of responsiveness and customer awareness.   Good personal organization and discipline.   Quick learner and demonstrates willingness to learn from others.   Able to communicate well.   Basic understanding of Social Selling techniques.   Comfortable with working in a team environment.  Interested candidates please click “Apply Now”. We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be informed.  Triton AI Pte Ltd Registration Number: R23112017 EA: 21C0661

Responsibilities for Technical Lead    Lead and work closely with an agile build and run team to deliver the application software, using Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) practices and its related toolsets   Develop architecture requirements and maintain oversight with all the Software Developers   Work closely with other internal teams within the organization to ensure that solutions are designed with customer user experience, scale/performance, security and operability in mind.   Ensure that the software releases are aligned, documented and follow the application release and deployment process for the various projects.   Facilitate and support the troubleshooting or root cause analysis of platform issues or incidents.   Lead and coordinate the domain technical and business discussions   Analyse, design and develop road maps and implementation plans based on a current versus future state   Communicate and coordinate architecture implementation and modification activities   Assist in post-implementation and continuous improvement efforts to enhance performance and provide increased functionality   Consults with clients and internal teams on solutions architecture   Design and drive the implementation of the solution architecture   Manage updates and releases of new code, be able to write and understand code in several programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, Ruby, C and Go.   Any other tasks which may be called upon or assigned  Qualifications for Technical Lead    Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related major   At least 5 years of experience with 1 year of tech leadership experience who aspire to grow this role   Expert with Linux operating system principles, networking, and multi-threading   Expert in software development skills in modern C++   Expert in Digital Ocean, VAPT Testing (Metasploit ; Burp suite), Gitlab   Expert in Programming Language: Typescript, ReactJS, NodeJS, .Net Core, Golang   Contributor/Committer or PMC of the open-source community is a plus   Good team player and able to work independently in fast paced environment   Possess strong leadership and communication skill and creative and innovative in nature to engage and influence key stakeholders.

Main responsibilities:    Develop detailed project plan for new product launches, collaborate effectively with relevant global, regional and cross-functional stakeholders to efficiently drive project conceptualization, planning and implementation   Source, identify and develop new technology to provide innovative solutions in formulation and process design, shelf life extension, quality improvement, or format transformation in the snacks, sauce, paste and seasoning applications   Subject matter expert pertaining to product technical information, regulatory compliance for countries - ASEAN, USA, Canada etc., and food safety management system   Deliver projects with quality outcomes e.g., new food products with excellent quality within set timelines   Provide quick, thorough analysis of projects while providing thoughtful and ethical judgment, innovative ideas and agile response for tasks and situations   Proactively seek diverse inputs and insights from macro-environment and stakeholders to drive discussion, decision-making and innovative solutions   Work closely with CXOs, manager and cross-functional team members to execute ad hoc projects and other tasks allocated  Desired skills ; experiences:    A diploma or bachelor’s degree in Food Science, Food Technology or any other relevant discipline   5 - 8 years of experience in similar/ related role (e.g., food product development of snacks, sauce, paste or seasonings) is preferred   Good skills in prototypes, applications development and factory scale-up   Good communication and negotiation skills   Ability to show initiative, provide direction, and work with others as part of cross functional team   High degree of flexibility, organized and detail-oriented   Quick learner of new concepts in different areas   Ability to analyse issues and recognize gaps in processes, can combine scientific knowledge with legal aspects   Abilities to work under pressure, handle multiple priorities and meet strict deadlines   Ability to manage complexities and confidential information

jobs.jobTitle: URGENT!!! Tech Lead (Backend, Ruby on Rails, AWS, Socket IO, Up to $9K)
jobs.description: Highlights:    5 days work week   Work life balance   Great remuneration and benefits   Solid experience in Ruby on Rails is a bonus  Responsibilities:    Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, focusing on solution design, coding, deployment and debugging.   To build games backend services that power Html5 and Unity games.   To brainstorm solutions and design robust, highly scalable applications that can withstand high traffic with minimum down time together with engineers from other countries.   To work closely with product owners, key users, artists and the quality assurance team to ensure deliverables are as per expectation.   Develop ideasfor new products, or features by monitoring industry developments and trends.   Participating in continuing education and training to remain current on best practices, learn new programming languages, and better assist other team members.   Troubleshoot applications, conduct performance testing and optimize services to enhance user experience and minimize resource consumption.   To provide off-duty support.  Requirements:    Minimally 5 years of software engineering experience (web development) across the full development lifecycle.   Minimally 3 years of web development experience using Ruby on Rails.   Proficient with both NoSQL ; SQL databases (Mongo, Redis, MySQL)   Good knowledge of Html5 and Javascript.   Thorough understanding of Computer Science fundamentals such as OOP, RESTful architectures, Design Patterns etc.   Good knowledge of containerization framework (Docker, Rancher, Kubernetes).   Good understanding of authentication frameworks and data communication protocols like webSockets, signalR, Socket.IO.   Good working knowledge of CI/CD environments or pipelines. (Gitlab, Jenkins, AWS Codepipeline)   Experience with cloud technologies (AWS preferably). Example: IAM, EC2, Lambda, AWS RDS, Elasticsearch, AWS CodeBuild etc.   Able to fulfil off-hours production support if required (L2).  Bonus:    Experience in designing game backends using Ruby on Rails.   Experience in building games in Cocos or UNITY.   Domain knowledge of the game industry from game development to actual game operation.   Experience in data engineering tools like Jupyter and Python. At F5, we strive to bring a better digital world to life. Our teams empower organizations across the globe to create, secure, and run applications that enhance how we experience our evolving digital world. We are passionate about cybersecurity, from protecting consumers from fraud to enabling companies to focus on innovation. Everything we do centers around people. That means we obsess over how to make the lives of our customers, and their customers, better. And it means we prioritize a diverse F5 community where each individual can thrive.  Role Overview:  The APCJ HR Analyst will be the lead in the journey towards Digital and Data-Driven HR.  This role will produce business-critical people insights to enable the business and HR to move faster and make better decisions by applying analytics and research to our employee data. This role will lead and drive automation projects in HR to improve HR efficiency and enhance employee experience.  What you will do: HR Data ; Analytics Management    Own and drive analyses and modeling of HR data to identify trends and make future predictions; interpret data and communicate key findings to HR and business leaders.   Develop, implement and support employee data related scorecards and dashboards.   Critically evaluate and report on information gathered from multiple sources.   Apply a breadth of tools and analytical techniques to answer a wide range of high-impact people-related business questions.   Manage on-demand and ad hoc HR related reports and requests.   Ensure HR data and systems are complying to employment laws, data privacy regulations.  HR Automation ; Technology Adoption    Integrate key HR systems/databases for analytics, tracking key metrics and automating high volume processes.   Analysing HR data from various sources, e.g. ticketing system, new hire onboarding survey, exit management records, L;D records, etc.   Automate high volume/sensitive admin/HR tasks and processes to improve accuracy and efficiency.   Proactively drives activities that are necessary for the success of internal customers in the adoption and use of HR technology and analytics.   Implement solutions to HR related issues or processes.   Partner with Global HRIS team on the data integration of HRIS systems to other company systems   Key liaison with Global HRIS and Technology Services team.  What you will bring:    5+ years progressive work experience applying analytical methods to business problems, driving improved decision-making and outcomes; HR experience preferred.   Extensive knowledge and skills in visualization tool preferably in Tableau   Extensive knowledge and skills in Excel and Power Platform (Power App, Power Automate)   Skills in designing and developing business dashboards and data visualizations in Tableau and BI platforms.   Experience in Workday and ServiceNow preferred.   Ability to work effectively under pressure with multiple deliverables.   Strong presentation skills including building meaningful materials, presenting effectively to leadership and responding to questions on-the-fly based on in-role business context and acumen.   BA/BS degree in Business, Data, HR or related field  What You’ll Get:    Hybrid working mode   Career growth and development opportunities   Recognitions and Rewards   Employee Assistance Program   Competitive pay, comprehensive benefits, and cool perks   Culture of Giving Back   Dynamic Diversity ; Inclusion interest groups  Apply if you believe your own unique capabilities can contribute to the success of this role and our organization!  #LI-YO  The Job Description is intended to be a general representation of the responsibilities and requirements of the job. However, the description may not be all-inclusive, and responsibilities and requirements are subject to change.  Please note that F5 only contacts candidates through F5 email address (ending with @f5.com) or auto email notification from Yello/Workday (ending with f5.com or @myworkday.com).  Equal Employment Opportunity It is the policy of F5 to provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and employment applicants without regard to unlawful considerations of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, sensory, physical, or mental disability, marital status, veteran or military status, genetic information, or any other classification protected by applicable local, state, or federal laws. This policy applies to all aspects of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, job assignment, compensation, promotion, benefits, training, discipline, and termination.  F5 offers a variety of reasonable accommodations for candidates. Requesting an accommodation is completely voluntary. F5 will assess the need for accommodations in the application process separately from those that may be needed to perform the job. Request by contacting accommodations@f5.com.

Roles and Responsibilities:    Develop detailed product requirements and conduct market readiness evaluations during testing phases to ensure product quality and performance goals are met.   Participate in cross-functional teams to resolve business issues related to technology projects with significant business impact   Participate in technology projects for small product enhancements and minor customizations   Serve as Subject Matter Expert (SME) on product customization projects and influence decisions through advice, counsel, and/or facilitating services to others in area of specialization   Document new products and/or changes to existing products, ensure smooth business implementation during launch process, and prioritize and validate potentially dynamic material from multiple sources using analytical skills   Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating consideration for the MVGX's reputation, and safeguarding its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules, and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing, and reporting control issues with transparency.  Requirements:    A bachelor's degree or above with a computer science related major.   Minimum of 3 to 5 years relevant experience of product management and software development programming experience.   Familiar with AGILE methodology   Previous working experience within at least one of the following sectors, Financial Institutions, Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG), Fintech industry.   Proven track record in project management and as a product analyst or equivalent preferably in a financial institution.   Strong financial product design capability and ability to understand user experience and a mindset of developing scalable and portable solutions.   PMP certification or equivalent will be advantageous.   Strong knowledge of the operational model of an exchange and/or knowledge of trading environments (securities, listed derivatives, and OTC products) would be preferred.   Fluency in both English and Mandarin   Result-oriented, hands-on, and diligent.   A team player that collaborates well with other departments.  If you are looking to be part of an exciting team within the financial technology industry, we would like to hear from you. Remuneration will be commensurate with experience and qualifications. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified

We, at xNara, are looking for a Team Lead to join the tech team in a time when we are scaling up our business and expanding into Dubai, Singapore and India. You will be involved in building up the team as well as the tech platform to support the business requirements.  As a key team member, you have planning and supervisory responsibilities which will utilise your past work experience to achieve the best outcomes. The team will also look to you for expert advise in helping them to get past development roadblocks. You will be expected to have a hands-on involvement in delivering the tech output. You should exude curiosity and passion in the tech domain and instil those qualities in the team.  What you will be doing? Team Management    Lead by example in demonstrating strong work ethics.   Work effectively in a multi-national team.   Be an excellent communicator.   Promote and maintain a positive work culture amongst team members.   Identify and cultivate competency and work excellence in the team.   Proficient in Agile.  Product Development    Be an innovative problem solver.   Embody a progressive work attitude and be independent in approaching work.   Ensure that work execution by team follows best practices and industry standards.   Able to translate business and operational requirements to tech planning and implementation.   Advocates structure and organization in daily work within the team.   Actively contribute to day-to-day development work for the xNara platform.   Perform and organise code reviews for the team.  What will you bring to the role?    6+ years in a similar role.   Expert in Node and/or Java.   Be proficient in 2 or more server-side languages.   Have expertise in 2 or more database technologies (MySQL, MS Sql Server, MongoDB, Postgres).   Expert in build orchestration (Kubernetes) and containerisation (Docker).   Expert in managing cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure).   Expert in version control branch planning and management.   Familiar in DevOps planning and management.   Working experience in managing mobile app projects.   Working experience in working with Big Data services (Data Lake, Data Warehouse) is a plus.   BS in Computer Science, MIS or similar field.

Job Description: Posting Title: Technical Lead (Java) Job Summary: A Java Technical Lead designs and recommends technical solutions for IT-related issues. The responsibilities of a Java Technical Lead include working with developers to ensure quality deliverables, mentoring junior level staff, and identifying issues that affect product delivery. Job Description: We are looking for an experienced Java Technical (Tech) Lead to be responsible for providing solutions for technical issues which may affect product delivery. He or she will facilitate requirement analysis, conduct code reviews, provide feedback, and enhance frameworks. To be successful as a Java Tech Lead, you should demonstrate sound knowledge of industry best practices, good organizational and leadership skills, and proficiency in JAVA technologies. Ultimately, the Java Tech Lead should possess good analytical skills, the ability to anticipate issues and frame remedial actions, and excellent teamwork skills. Roles and Responsibilities:    To perform requirement analysis and oversee the implementation of architectures of project scope   To provide customized reusable solutions of project, program or operational scope   To develop high-quality and detailed designs   To conduct unit testing using automated unit test frameworks and identify and address possible risk by conducting mitigation action planning   Conducting configuration of your own work or from the team and assess the technical impact of multiple technologies/strategies   Reviewing the work of other developers with feedback for improvement (if applicable)   Using coding standards and best practices to ensure quality deliverables   Contribute as a team member to an operational, integration or application architecture requirements, design, implementation, or on-going operations deliverables  Requirements:    Candidate must possess at least a Diploma/Degree in Computing/Information Technology or equivalent   At least 5 years of development experience in Java   Experience in Spring/Spring Boot framework   Experience in relational databases such as Oracle and MySQL   Experience in implementing web services such as SOAP and RESTful web services   Experience in frontend frameworks such as Angular, Struts, jQuery and Bootstrap   Experience in batch processing implementations   Have implemented some form of custom frameworks such as security and validations   Have some team leading experience   Good verbal and written communication skills   Advanced understanding of modern software development methodologies   Advanced understanding of software testing methodologies, scripting and tools   Minimum experience of three or more full SDLC for web application projects   Ability to work effectively in a team and with client  Good to have:    Experience in Agile development environments   Experience in DevOps toolchains   Experience in container platforms such as Docker and Kubernetes   Experience in messaging platforms such as Kafka and IBM MQ   Experience in Application Servers configurations like WebSphere and WebLogic will be an advantage   Experience in software testing tools such as Selenium, Karate, Microfocus UFT and Katalon

We are looking for a Technical Lead to lead a cross functional team serving our customer's needs.  THE ROLE    An obsessive automator who only wants to manually test things once.   A concise documenter who takes as much care of their README.md as they do their service interface.   An owner end to end, Frontend, Backend, CI/CD, Operations, understanding what it takes to build a resilient, scalable service and support it in production. YOUR TASKS    Lead a team of engineers to drive monetisation initiatives within the company.   Build high quality, fault tolerant systems and products, owning all areas of implementation, frontend, backend, CI pipeline, automated test suites and operations. About the company An established information technology system integrator serving the B2B markets is looking for a hands-on Finance Manager to join their finance team.  About the job Report to the CFO, you will be leading a sizeable finance team in managing the full spectrum of financial management and oversee all accounting operations. You will ensure accurate management reporting, budgeting, planning and forecasting activities. You will be the go-to-person and advise on latest developments in financial regulatory standards, while driving continuous improvements to business processes, controls and policies. You will also support their corporate finance activities including fund-raising activities.  Skills and experience required You are professional qualified (such as, CPA/CA) with at least 6 years of hands-on finance/accounting operations experience. You have prior managerial experience, proactive and strong interpersonal skills. Due to urgency of the position, those with immediate basis or less than 1 month notice will be considered. You are also comfortable travelling to the Changi Business Park (office site).  Why is this a good role? A high visibility position as you work directly with the CFO. This is a company which provides internal mobility opportunities and has a cooperative culture.   If you are looking for a fast-paced environment, please click the 'apply' function for a smooth easy process to register your interest and CV for the role. Consultant-in-charge: Stella Tan (EA: 94C3609 \R1984239).  https://www.linkedin.com/in/sgtanstella   Applicants must be fully vaccinated or have a valid exemption in accordance with MOM’s regulations to allow them to enter the workplace. Applicants may be required to share verifiable COVID-19 vaccination documents or proof of a valid exemption at the point of offer. Randstad Pte. Limited and/or the Client reserves the right to withdraw an offer if the applicant fails to provide verifiable COVID-19 vaccination and/or proof of exemption documents.

jobs.description: Job Responsibilities:    Install, upgrade, support for IT Resources including areas such as computer hardware, operating systems, applications, and any other Company’s authorized peripheral equipment   Troubleshoot system, network problems, diagnosing and solving hardware or software faults   Support IT infrastructure components such as servers, storage, networks (WAN, LAN, Firewalls, etc.) and workstations etc   Support with the testing and installation of new applications and update patches, follow-up with users to ensure the problem is resolved including maintaining an IT library.   Administer, manage and decommissioning of the IT Resources as per Company’s disposal policy and procedures   Work together with cross border team(s) including external service providers for performance of IT operations   Ensure and follow standard IT service delivery processes in accordance with Company’s IT policies and procedures   Proactively work with internal teams to optimize and improve IT support processes and procedures   Maintain up to date documentation for all IT related matters including areas for IT infrastructure components and IT operation processes   Ensure technical and application incidents within domain are addressed and resolved, record events and problems and their resolution in logs   Perform testing and evaluation of new technologies   Analyze and develop appropriate computing techniques in support for product development   Research and develop forward computing software techniques for software and application   Work with IT and software teams to provide feasible applications including review of codes   Work and support software development teams for product development.   Work with production engineering teams on app functional tests, systems, databases, and networks for NPI needs.   Drafting of documentation relating to software solutions introduced towards product development  Job Requirements:    Minimum Diploma/Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology or any IT-related discipline   Working knowledge and expertise with a variety of software, hardware, and applications.   Prior experience in desktop support / IT support or in a similar role   Proficiency in Windows/Linux/Mac OS   Proficient in Microsoft Office Skills is mandatory   Experience in system/network/software troubleshooting   Certification in Microsoft, Linux, or Cisco is advantageous   Analytical skills to study problems including its records and identify plausible solutions.   Team-oriented attitude to help other colleagues and departments with technical problems   Strong interpersonal communication and relationship-building skills   Ability to manage time and effectively prioritize numerous projects at one time

Are you a highly skilled and driven individual looking to take your career to the next level? Look no further than Terra Systems! We are a dynamic company with hundreds of employees across the Asia Pacific region, specializing in innovative communications solutions and services using cutting-edge AI and Cybersecurity technologies.  We are seeking a Tech Sales Rockstar to join our team of talented business professionals. In this role, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, developing, and executing strategic sales and marketing campaigns across multiple channels to drive and optimize key KPIs and growth metrics for our company. You will focus on Enterprise Cybersecurity and IT Solutions, including AI Software (Chatbot, DMS, and Workflow Management), and will be expected to contact potential clients and business partners to establish rapport and collaborate with the Marketing and Business Development Divisions to generate a strong pipeline of leads.  At Terra, we believe in fostering a culture that rewards excellence and encourages accountability. We understand that every decision we make has a direct impact on the success of our company, and we hold ourselves to the highest standards of professionalism and integrity. We are looking for someone who is confident and able to display leadership qualities, is a strong communicator with excellent verbal and written skills, creative with a keen eye for details, and a proactive team player who enjoys working with other highly motivated individuals.  To be considered for this role, you must have at least 5 years of business development and/or relationship management experience in the IT or Cybersecurity industry, with a demonstrated track record of success in B2B sales. You must possess a degree in IT or a relevant field, excellent communication and presentation skills, and the ability to build rapport. The ideal candidate will have a strong business acumen, be dynamic and highly adaptable to the business's needs and priorities and possess the ability to multitask and wear many hats if required.  If you are looking to make an impact and play a part in shaping the AI and Cybersecurity Technology industry globally, we encourage you to send your CV and expected salary to us. Join our team of talented business professionals to plan and execute business initiatives that support Terra's business growth in the Asia Pacific region!

Tech, Operations    Develop strategies that align with business imperatives   Based in Singapore, the regional hub for Asia Pacific (AP) and top-ranked biopharmaceutical company on the Straits Times and Statista’s list of Best Employers in Singapore for two consecutive years (2020, 2021).   Join the premier biopharmaceutical company that has been in Singapore for more than 25 years and in AP for over 60 years.  Our Manufacturing Operations teams are the people that make our products. We work in the manufacturing plants with a “Safety First, Quality Always” mindset striving for continuous improvement. We work in the local plant connected to our global manufacturing network to ensure the highest quality of raw materials, intermediates and finished products.  Working in 8 hours day shift from Monday to Friday reporting to Shift Production Manager, you are responsible for supporting and executing the Packaging operations Start-Up. This involves working closely together with cross functional team to ensure Safety, Quality, Compliance and Operational aspects of the packaging lines during start-up of new vial packaging line and subsequently support routine Packaging operations activities, operation ; troubleshooting of the equipment to ensure they meet GMP, regulatory and supply requirements.  WHAT YOU WILL DO Responsibilities include, but are not limited to: Safety ; Compliance    Meet site’s Safety, Health and Environment (SHE) performance objectives and participate in improvement initiatives   Perform Packaging operations as per production operational needs and ensure Safety and cGMP requirements are met.   Actively contribute to resolve problems and seek improvement opportunities within the work module assigned   Implement corrective actions as documented following regulatory inspections and internal audits.   Ensure operations related activity is completed according to established procedures and all associated documentation is completed to a high standard.   Participate in and supports the implementation of actions for Investigations and Audits.   Participate in Emergency Response Team (ERT) as a team member when assigned.  Enhance and uphold Operations Quality    Responsible for completing all assigned operational tasks, whilst ensuring documentation is accurate and completed for the assigned equipment.   Able to provide constructive feedback and solutions to issues identified in the work place.   Responsible to participate in improvement projects and actively generate ideas   Ensure both operational knowledge and technical skills are maintained and compliant based on training requirements.   Use tier meetings and other opportunities to engage positively with others so as to foster team collaboration and co-create a high performance work environment.  Operations Excellence    Meet performance metrics of the assigned operations.   Responsible for maintaining good facility housekeeping and pro-actively carry out minor repair works on packaging equipment   Effectively communicates throughout the shift and during shift handover. Escalate operational issues to appropriate level when required.   Provide detailed information for all operational events to assist in Quality notification investigations.   Perform routine GMP equipment cleaning/minor maintenance and equipment set-up, and support area cleaning as assigned.   Resolve issues in a timely manner and participate in continuous improvement initiatives.   Situationally aware and perceptive while operating the machinery.   Ensure packaged products meet safety and quality specifications  Problem solving    Analyze and recommend solutions for identified issues   Support Production and Maintenance teams on problem solving and troubleshooting.   Able to properly assess the situation and understand when to escalate to a higher level.   Work together with the team to use 5S tool to maintain the working environment and perform Kaizen for improvement activities.  WHAT YOU MUST HAVE To be successful in this role, you will have:    O-level / Diploma in Technical Area   3 to 5 years previous manufacturing experience in the pharmaceutical or similar industry.   Strong background in operation of chemical/pharmaceutical systems including hands-on experience.   Familiarized with cGMP working environment and good understanding of safety practices   Good oral/written communication and interpersonal skills.   Basic knowledge in using Microsoft Office   Normal office working hour (Monday to Friday 8am to 5pm)  WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT    Opportunity to work in a market giant  Our Manufacturing ; Supply Division is committed to be the most trusted supplier of bio-pharmaceuticals worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, create an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a high quality, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time.  Who we are… We are known as Merck ; Co., Inc., Rahway, New Jersey, USA in the United States and Canada and MSD everywhere else. For more than a century, we have been inventing for life, bringing forward medicines and vaccines for many of the world's most challenging diseases. Today, our company continues to be at the forefront of research to deliver innovative health solutions and advance the prevention and treatment of diseases that threaten people and animals around the world.  What we look for… Imagine getting up in the morning for a job as important as helping to save and improve lives around the world. Here, you have that opportunity. You can put your empathy, creativity, digital mastery, or scientific genius to work in collaboration with a diverse group of colleagues who pursue and bring hope to countless people who are battling some of the most challenging diseases of our time. Our team is constantly evolving, so if you are among the intellectually curious, join us — and start making your impact today.  We are proud to be a company that embraces the value of bringing diverse, talented, and committed people together. The fastest way to breakthrough innovation is when diverse ideas come together in an inclusive environment. We encourage our colleagues to respectfully challenge one another’s thinking and approach problems collectively. We are an equal opportunity employer, committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace.

Role: Tech Lead(Payments)  JD:    Develop modern micro-frontends, using DevOps practices to develop, test and deploy.   Develop responsive and mobile friendly designs.   Develop robust solutions with focus on security, performance, internationalization, and   browser-compatibility.   Understand the business process requirements and drive the detailed design of the   application and technical architecture components.   Configure, build and test application and technical architecture components of quality   and security.   Work with other developers, designers, and architects to make sure that the   configuration and custom components meet application requirements and performance   goals.   Plan and execute all required process steps as defined in our Agile methodologies.   Anticipate, identify, track, and resolve issues and risks affecting the delivery.   Perform L2 troubleshooting duties.  Requirements    Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or relevant field.   At least 5 years of relevant experience in full stack development framework.   Understand and develop coherent user experience flows.   Able to collaborate in a Scrum team setting cohesively.   Perform effectively as an individual when needed.   Demonstrate clarity in communicating and presenting complex information to technical and non-technical stakeholders, both verbally and in written form.   Familiar with the following technologies:  Frontend Focus    Script: JavaScript, TypeScript, ES6, jQuery   Design ; Style: HTML5, Responsive/Adaptive Design, Design Thinking, Usability   Design, CSS3, LESS, SASS, Bootstrap   Frameworks: (At least one of the following) ReactJS + NextJS, AngularJS, VueJS   Backend: NodeJS, ExpressJS   Web DevOps ; Test: Jira, BitBucket/Git, Cypress, Jasmine, Selenium, Jest   Familiarity with AWS components such as Lambda, is a plus  Backend Focus    Frameworks: (At least one of the following) Spring Boot, Quarkus   DevOps ; Test: Git, Jenkins, SonarQube, JUnit, JMeter   Proficient in JIT 11 and up.   Familiarity with Kubernetes platform such as Openshift, is a plus

jobs.description: Job Description - Should have good knowledge in Retail Banking concepts.   - Should have in depth knowledge in Cards, Loans, Mortgages, Deposits and   Derivatives.   - Should have experience as a Data Analyst with good hands on experience in   creating statistical data models using Python/R Program.   - Should be capable of interpreting the model output and provide impactful   conclusions and suggestions to improve the business.   - Knowledge in Wholesale banking products will be an added advantage.   - Should possess basic knowledge in Teradata SQL.   - Should have good communication skills and should be able to elicit   requirement's from the Clients and document them.   -Should have In- depth knowledge in Datastage.   -Should have Good understanding of Datawarehousing concepts.   -Should have Requires exceptional expertise in development and detailed   knowledge of industry trends.    -Should have Applied the highest level technical skill and expertise in   project/team leadership to highly complex projects and problems. Job Requirements Key skills required for the job are: - Data Science (Python/R Programing) - Datastage Development  - Banking Domain-L3   As a Technical Lead with the banking domain knowledge, you are responsible for supporting project teams ; team members in terms of research and background information. You are expected to elicit and detail the client requirements via industry standard analysis techniques such as data flow modeling, case analysis, workflow analysis, functional decomposition analysis, data modeling, and object modeling. You are expected to documents the results of analysis activities using appropriate templates or tools. You are responsible across areas like requirement definition, execution and evaluation of functional tests, review, testing and analysis. You are expected to be a subject matter expert in a chosen area/function. You should have in-depth knowledge in Data Science like Python/R Programming and should be able to create data models based upon the financial data and interpret the same to provide business solutions and lead the team in development/Support.

SUMMARY: The Technical Analyst plays a crucial role within a result driven, innovative Ecommerce solution. Besides owns and tracks the business requirements, the ideal candidate needs to be able to organize and execute user acceptance test, organize training and hand over the validated system feature, provide daily support to client team when they have challenge on playing with SFCC platform. Essential Duties and Responsibilities include but are not limited to the following: • Partner with key clients in the Asia Pacific region to analyze E-Commerce process and integration gaps, elicit and capture complete and unambiguous system requirements, and break down complex processes into workable units. • Listen to client’s stakeholders in order to understand the high-level objectives down to the fine details and convert to accurate functional and non-functional requirements. • Own the quality and accuracy of the requirements and communicate changes and decisions to the relevant stakeholders and teammates. • Represent user, system, functional and non-functional requirements using traditional modeling artifacts that are efficient for Ranosys. • Develop test plans and test scenarios in accordance with business requirements. • Execute and document test results including functional and regression scenarios. • Lead training and User Acceptance Testing for regional teammates.  Technical Attributes of Ideal Candidate: include but are not limited to the following:   Proven track record with industry leading companies utilizing strong problem solving and analytical skills to understand business challenges and opportunities in the context of the requirements.  5 years of proven experience in business and technical requirements analysis within the Ecommerce industry, knowledge of the Sales Force Commerce Cloud platform is a plus.  Experience working within teams using waterfall and agile methodologies.  Exceptional verbal and written communication skills including the ability to communicate complex and technical concepts breakdown to appropriate level, and the courage to ask compelling and clarifying questions to ensure accuracy and understanding.  Find creative solutions to complicated and unexpected problems by leveraging teammate experience and expertise.  Proven success facilitating meetings that motivate the team, encourage participation, remain on topic, and generate expected outcomes.  Self-starter with a positive attitude and ability to work under pressure in a challenging fast paced environment with tight deadlines. Balances team and individual responsibilities and contributes to building a positive team spirit.  Excellent time management skills with ability to manage multiple tasks and assignments concurrently and deliver on commitments.  A sincere and contagious passion for building Ranosys, and a fit with Ranosys cultural values.  Fluency in English

COMPANY BACKGROUND  Kosmode Health Singapore Pte Ltd , https://kosmodehealth.com/, a National University of Singapore start-up, is a Singapore-based Holding company with a wholly owned subsidiary in Suzhou, China. KosmodeHealth’s mission is to expand access to health from nature by valorising food processing waste into functional ingredients for functional food applications, and into functional materials for 3D cell culture applications. Example of functional ingredients are protein ; fibre extracted from Spent Barley Grains. The extracted protein ; fibre has been formulated into the world’s only functional food with zero blood sugar response, branded as W0W®Noodles  https://www.w0wnoodle.com/. Example of functional materials are Plant Protein Composite (PPC™) bioink formulated with protein extracted from food processing waste. The PPC™ bioink is 3D printed into Plant Protein Composite (PPC™) scaffold for culturing of cells. Having laid a strong foundation, KosmodeHealth is poised for business outreach and growth. As we expand our business operations, we seek talents who thrives on solving industry problems, is a resourceful, multi-tasker with the resilience and perseverance to drive success in people-centric culture where integrity is the core value and quality a given.  OVERALL JOB SCOPE ; RESPONSIBILITIES Role ; Responsibilities The Marketing Executive/Manager achieves set business objectives through product portfolio planning ; management, developing ; executing strategic marketing plans ; campaigns to drive both top line and bottom-line growth for the organization and individual product lines. Specific tasks include    Keeping abreast of market trends ; environment   Coordinate with Product Development team on new product launches and campaigns.   Develop product/packaging/ branding design and marketing campaigns for existing and new product launches.   Ensure consistent communication of corporate and product positioning and core messages with regular training of company staff.   Coordinating ; execution of marketing strategies/ activities ; online and offline events.   Branding, advertising, and promotional campaigns.   Analyze data to evaluate the success of their marketing efforts and come up with new ideas to improve brand marketing and exposure   Generating new businesses; planning ; organizing marketing events ; activities for customers’ acquisition, retention ; growth.   Work closely across departments to ensure alignment and development of efficient and effective processes in line with business objectives, coordinating business process improvement with internal stakeholders.   Lead interface for sales with marketing, production, quality, logistics and other internal functions to ensure timely fulfilment of customers’ orders.   DESIRED CANDIDATE PROFILE Academic Qualifications ; Experience    Bachelor’s degree in marketing, finance, business administration and related field, with at least 2 years of experience in product and/or marketing management.   Diploma holder with at least 5 years relevant marketing experience can be considered.   Ability to read and understand scientific publications is a basic requisite.  Preferred Skills and Experience As a lean start-up, KosmodeHealth has a flat organization structure where all staff is personally responsible for achievement of set objectives, in a multi-faceted dynamic, fast paced environment. The successful candidate has the following characteristics:    A resourceful, self-driven individual who thrive in a dynamic fast-paced environment.   Excellent communication ; stakeholder management skills   Good problem-solving skills with demonstratable ability to think creatively and innovatively   Good time/budget management with proven ability to perform in  a resource constraint environment.   Analytical skills to forecast and identify trends and challenges   Familiarity with the latest trends, technologies and methodologies in graphic design, web design, production, etc.   Strong decision-making ability.
